What are the symptoms of Multiple pterygium syndrome Escobar type ?,"What are the signs and symptoms of Multiple pterygium syndrome Escobar type? Symptoms of multiple pterygium syndrome, Escobar type vary but may include short stature, vertebral (spine) defects,
